snippet: The sculpture exhibition at the Forum Gallery surveys the post-World War I revival of classicist aesthetics in works by Gaston Lachaise, Jacques Lipchitz, John Storrs and others.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews exhibit The Figure in Modern Sculpture at Forum Gallery.
lead_paragraph: The sculpture exhibition at the Forum Gallery surveys the post-World War I revival of classicist aesthetics in works by Gaston Lachaise, Jacques Lipchitz, John Storrs and others.
